module.name: mechanical_design_geometric_presentation
module.keywords: module, visual presentation, mechanical design model, projection, surface styles

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the visual presentation of the shape of mechanical design models. Shape is projected into a plane display area. The projections themselves are not represented, however the shape and corresponding projection algorithms are given. Presentation attributes are included, such as line font and colour, that may be applied to parts or all of wireframe, surface, and solid models. Association of attributes with topological items is included to provide for the styling of high level shape constructs. Advanced visualization capabilities, such as light sources and surface reflectance are not included.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Camera view 3d, ISO/TS 10303-1316;
items within the scope of application module Shape appearance layers, ISO/TS 10303-1009.
